attributes.action: Postumous MBE for Peter Osgood for his service's to Chelsea Football Club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Peter Osgood made 560 appearanes for chelsea over a 10 year  period. He was top scorer in the first division in 1969/70 season with 31 goals, also  scoring in every round of the F.A Cup that season helping Chelsea win there first ever F.A cup, with arguably the greatest ever F.A Cup final goal scored in the replayed final at Old Trafford. Peter Osgood also played in the European cup winners cup final the following season against the legendary Real Madrid scoring the winner against them, Peter Osgood was an England international player that should have played many more times for his country.
